title: Kim Basinger looks flawlessly smooth on red carpet at animal welfare event
text:

Hollywood legend Kim Basinger hit the red carpet on Saturday night, rocking a very cosmopolitan, sophisticated look.

The 65 year-old's skin appeared completely smooth and wrinkle-free as she sported a white blazer and long trousers to match.

She tied up her blond locks behind in a messy bun, letting her bangs drape across her face.

Kim was attending an event put on by Last Chance for Animals, a peaceful protest group that aims to eradicate animal cruelty.

She's well known for her veganism and love of animals, and turned out in support of the group's mission.

Kim was previously married to fellow acting world heavyweight Alec Baldwin , having met on set of the 1990 film The Marrying Man.

(Image: MediaPunch/REX)

(Image: Getty Images)

They wed three years later, and in the mid nineties had daughter Ireland.

In 2002, they finalised their divorce.

It was widely covered at the time, and Kim told Net-A-Porter's Edit magazine in 2016 that she and Alec are "cool."

(Image: MediaPunch/REX)

(Image: splashnews)

She said of Ireland: "Divorce is hard on a kid, no matter how you cut it.

"And ours was very public and nasty. So I brought up Ireland in a very unconventional way. I just wanted her to be free.

"If she wanted to have her friends over and write over the walls with pen, that was fine. I wanted her childhood to be full of love and light and animals and friends."

Alec gave an interview with The Guardian in which he candidly told that the years of divorce proceedings from Kim was like "staring off a cliff for six years."
description: Kim cut a sophisticated figure on the red carpet at the Last Chance For Animals' 35th Anniversary Gala
